mapper.sql: gassurveyid, reporter, phone, devicename, reportdate, processflow, runhour, production, emissionway, voczhili, handledeviceefficiency, handledevicename, capcity, handledeviceflow, status, factory_id

from gasemission
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into gasemission (gassurveyid, reporter, phone, devicename, reportdate, processflow, runhour, production, emissionway, voczhili, handledeviceefficiency, handledevicename, capcity, handledeviceflow, status, factory_id) values (#{gassurveyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processflow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{production,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emissionway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voczhili,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handledeviceefficiency,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{handledevicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capcity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{handledeviceflow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
